衰退一途: (すいたいいっと) - (yoji) (falling into a) continuous decline; being on the wane
衰退期: (すいたいき) - phase of decline; ebb; twilight
衰頽: (すいたい) - decline; degeneration; decay; waning; ebbing
衵: (じつ) - Roupas do dia a dia
衵扇: (あこめおうぎ) - formal folding fan made of hinoki cypress (formerly used by court ladies)
衷情: (ちゅうじょう) - true heart; inner feelings
衿下: (えりした) - usu. the drop between collar and bottom hem on kimono, yukata, etc.
衿元: (えりもと) - front of neck; collar
衿芯: (えりしん) - collar core (stiff fabric, etc. inside a collar)
衿裏: (えりうら) - lining of the collar
衿足: (えりあし) - nape of neck; border of hair at back of neck
袂: (べい) - Sleeve , sleeve (especialmente de um quimono), pocket of sleeve; vicinity (esp. of a bridge); foot of a mountain, base of a mountain
袂の露: (たもとのつゆ) - (lit., e.g. in 源氏物語) tears on the sleeves (of one's kimono); weeping copiously
袂を分かつ: (たもとをわかつ) - part from (with); part company with; break with
袂を絞る: (たもとをしぼる) - to shed many tears; to weep; to wring dry one's sleeve (which has been soaked by tears)
袂を連ねる: (たもとをつらねる) - to do in unison; to do en masse
袂糞: (たもとくそ) - dust, etc. that gathers in the bottoms of sleeves (esp. in Japanese traditional clothing)
袈裟: (けさ) - kasaya/monk's stole; wearing an article of clothing in the same manner as a kasaya (i.e. draped over one shoulder)
袈裟切り: (けさぎり) - slashing a sword diagonally from the shoulder
袈裟懸け: (けさがけ) - wearing a kasaya/wearing an article of clothing in the same manner as a kasaya (i.e. draped over one shoulder); slashing a sword diagonally from the shoulder
袈裟斬り: (けさぎり) - slashing a sword diagonally from the shoulder
袋: (tai/fukuro) - sack , bag, sack, pouch; skin of an orange (and other like fruits); dead end; plot of land surrounded by water
袋とじ: (ふくろとじ) - double-leaved printing (traditional East Asian books); sealed-page printing/magazine (esp. pornographic) with long side or all three sides sealed to prevent browsing; dual page
袋のねずみ: (ふくろのねずみ) - rat in a trap; trapped rat; rat in a bag
袋のネズミ: (ふくろのネズミ) - rat in a trap; trapped rat; rat in a bag
袋めん: (ふくろめん) - instant noodles (sold in a soft plastic packaging, as opposed to cup noodles)
袋八目: (フクロヤツメ) - pouched lamprey (Geotria australis); wide-mouthed lamprey
袋叩き: (ふくろだたき) - beat someone up by ganging up on
袋土竜: (フクロモグラ) - southern marsupial mole (Notoryctes typhlops)
袋地: (ふくろじ) - sacking/bagging; land that is surrounded by others' private property and is not directly accessible via public roads
袋小路: (ふくろこうじ) - blind alley; cul-de-sac; impasse; dead-end (street)
袋小路文: (ふくろこうじぶん) - easily misunderstood sentence; garden-path sentence; cul-de-sac sentence
袋形動物: (ふくろがたどうぶつ) - aschelminth (any invertebrate animal formerly classified as belonging to phylum Aschelminthes)
袋戸: (ふくろど) - paper sliding door for the cupboard of a tokonoma
袋戸棚: (ふくろとだな) - small cupboard on wall of tokonoma
袋手長猿: (フクロテナガザル) - siamang (species of gibbon, Symphalangus syndactylus)
袋棚: (ふくろだな) - tea ceremony stand with an enclosed shelf (invented by Takeno Jouou); small cupboard or closed shelf on the side of a tokonoma
袋狐: (フクロギツネ) - common brushtail possum (Trichosurus vulpecula)
袋狼: (フクロオオカミ) - Tasmanian tiger (Thylacinus cynocephalus); thylacine; Tasmanian wolf
袋綴じ: (ふくろとじ) - double-leaved printing (traditional East Asian books); sealed-page printing/magazine (esp. pornographic) with long side or all three sides sealed to prevent browsing; dual page
袋耳: (ふくろみみ) - retentive memory; double-woven edge of cloth; cryptotia/pocket ear
袋茸: (フクロタケ) - paddy straw mushroom; straw mushroom; Volvariella volvacea
袋蜘蛛: (フクログモ) - sac spider (any spider of family Clubionidae); Atypus karschi (Asian species of mygalomorph spider)
袋蟻食: (フクロアリクイ) - numbat (Myrmecobius fasciatus); banded anteater
袋鰻: (フクロウナギ) - pelican eel (Eurypharynx pelecanoides)
袋麺: (ふくろめん) - instant noodles (sold in a soft plastic packaging, as opposed to cup noodles)
袋鼯鼠: (フクロモモンガ) - sugar glider (species of flying phalanger, Petaurus breviceps)
袋鼯鼠騙: (フクロモモンガダマシ) - Leadbeater's possum (Gymnobelideus leadbeateri)
袍: (ほう) - Casaco, túnica de gola redonda usada por membros da nobreza e da corte imperial
袖: (shuu/sode) - sleeve , sleeve; wing (of a stage, desk, gate, etc.)
袖すり合うも他生の縁: (そですりあうもたしょうのえん) - a meeting by chance is preordained
袖すり合うも多生の縁: (そですりあうもたしょうのえん) - a meeting by chance is preordained
袖にする: (そでにする) - to be cold (to); to ignore (someone)
袖の下: (そでのした) - bribe; money under the table
袖の露: (そでのつゆ) - tears falling onto the sleeve
袖を通す: (そでをとおす) - to put on (of clothing); to put (arms) through sleeves
袖丈: (そでたけ) - length of a sleeve (of Western clothing); height of a sleeve (of traditional Japanese clothing)
袖下: (そでした) - bottom of the sleeve; height of the sleeve (of traditional Japanese clothing); secret/secret bribe
袖付: (そでつけ) - attaching a sleeve to the body of a shirt; sleeve seam
袖付け: (そでつけ) - attaching a sleeve to the body of a shirt; sleeve seam
袖垣: (そでがき) - low fence flanking a gate or entrance
袖山: (そでやま) - top crease of a sleeve (of traditional Japanese clothing); sleeve cap (of Western clothing)
袖手傍観: (しゅうしゅぼうかん) - (yoji) looking on with folded arms (with one's hands in one's sleeves); remaining a passive onlooker
袖振り合うも他生の縁: (そでふりあうもたしょうのえん) - A meeting by chance is preordained
袖擦り合うも他生の縁: (そですりあうもたしょうのえん) - a meeting by chance is preordained
袖擦り合うも多生の縁: (そですりあうもたしょうのえん) - a meeting by chance is preordained

袖看板: (そでかんばん) - projecting signboard; side signboard; signboard projecting from a building
袖裏: (そでうら) - lining of a sleeve; sleeve lining
